info.title: Process-Sync
info.description: topics or parts of topics in '[]' are placeholders

mqtt.description: this service subscribes with a '$share/[group-id]/' topic prefix, to enable service scaling without duplicate message handling. this prefix is transparent to other mqtt clients.

device-groups.description: topic may be configured by config.DeviceGroupTopic; messages will trigger updates to fog process deployments

process-deployment-done.description: topic may be configured by config.ProcessDeploymentDoneTopic; send when mgw has signaled finished process deployment

processes/[network-id]/cmd/deployment/de.description: send process deployment delete request to a mgw

processes/[network-id]/cmd/deployment/st.description: send process start request to a mgw

processes/[network-id]/cmd/process-insta.description: send process-instance-history delete request to a mgw
send process-instance delete request to a mgw

processes/[network-id]/state/deployment/.description: signal that process deployment has been deleted at mgw
informs about known deployments; resources on platform, that are not in this list will be deleted
informs about metadata of a process deployment

processes/[network-id]/state/incident/de.description: signal that an incident has been deleted at mgw

processes/[network-id]/state/incident/kn.description: informs about known incidents; resources on platform, that are not in this list will be deleted

processes/[network-id]/state/process-def.description: signal that a process-definition has been deleted at mgw
informs about known process-definitions; resources on platform, that are not in this list will be deleted

processes/[network-id]/state/process-ins.description: informs about a running process instance
signal that process-instance-history has been deleted at mgw
informs about known process-instance-history; resources on platform, that are not in this list will be deleted
signal that process instance has been deleted at mgw
informs about known process-instances; resources on platform, that are not in this list will be deleted
